name: Tebeo
summary:
Tebeo is the creator's first ever SMW hack. They themed every level in it around comic books they like (Tebeo means comic in spanish).

The difficulty of this hack scales up a bit at the end of the game, and also at the last level of each overworld. Overall the game is easy/medium Kaizo difficulty.

All the mechanics and sprites are vanilla and almost all the graphics, except some stuff edited on yychr. It has custom palettes and music.

About asm, it has some life quality patches, like instant retry and NoMoreSpriteTileLimits.
